content: *satisfy any sweet craving with these adorable knit donuts yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds * contrast a warm brown 01130 *1 ball or 36 yds/34 m* * contrast b jute 00082 *1 ball or 18 yds/17 m* * contrast c rose pink 00046 *1 ball or 18 yds/17 m* * contrast d robin s egg 01215 *1 ball or 18 yds/17 m* * contrast e soft ecru 01004 *1 ball or 18 yds/17 m* *additional materials * * stuffing * optional assorted colored beads for sprinkles --- **note ** *each donut uses 2 different shades choose a or b for color 1 and c d or e for color 2 1 donut requires 18 yds/17 m of color 1 and 18 yds/17 m of color 2 * ---
